subject: Running
New York City Marathon
Olympic Games
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Lauren Fleshman, a two-time national track champion, decided to race the New York City Marathon as preparation for her effort to run the 5,000 meters at the 2012 Olympics.
snippet: Lauren Fleshman, a two-time national track champion, decided to race the New York City Marathon as preparation for her effort to run the 5,000 meters at the 2012 Olympics.
